name: TE
bio: TE Connectivity designs and manufactures connectivity and sensor solutions for a variety of industries including automotive, industrial equipment, data communication systems, aerospace, defense, oil and gas, consumer electronics, energy and subsea communications.

name: soylent
bio: Soylent™ is a pioneer in food technology, producing healthy, functional foods that are good for the body and the planet. Soylent is produced with sustainability and efficiency in mind to create a convenient, nutritious, and affordable meal that is better for our health and the environment.

name: Autodesk
bio: Autodesk builds software for the architecture, engineering, construction, manufacturing, media, and entertainment industries that helps people imagine, design, and create a better world.

name: Slack
bio: Slack is our backbone. It brings all of our communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.

name: R Systems
bio: R Systems is a specialized IT Services & Solutions and IT-enabled Services provider catering to a wide range of global customers.

name: ARX PAX
bio: Arx Pax invented the patented Magnetic Field Architecture (MFA) technology, a more efficient way to transmit electromagnetic energy. Strategic applications of MFA technology and the use of MFA-based hover engines include structural isolation, recreation and entertainment, industrial automation, and transportation.

name: ANSYS
bio: ANSYS is pioneering the development and application of simulation methods to solve challenging product engineering problems, helping the world’s most innovative companies deliver radically better products to their customers.

name: McNichols
bio: McNICHOLS Company is North America’s leading supplier and fabricator of perforated metal, expanded metal, wire mesh, architectural metals and a variety of gratings products.

name: HyperRPG
bio: HyperRPG pushes the boundaries of collaborative storytelling and shared gaming experiences across the web and around the world, striving for inclusive content and representation.

name: Regalix
bio: Regalix is a digital marketing company that creates value and revenue growth with cutting edge marketing techniques and innovation models.

name: IPS
bio: IPS (International Power Supply) is a 27 years experienced company specializing in the R&D and manufacturing of power electronics and energy conversion technologies.

name: Coast Metal Cutting
bio: Coast Metal offers a complete machining and metal cutting service. Their extensive range of equipment allows them to precision cut massive to miniature parts.

name: Talla
bio: Talla is your Service Assistant, bringing an A.I.-powered service desk to HR, IT, and other internal service teams.
